title: Augmented Reality (AR)-Based Experimental Learning for Power Device Thermal Management

context.prior_knowledge: Basic concepts of electrical circuits and heat transfer
context.additional_context: Non-face-to-face experimental learning visually exploring heat management principles using smartphone-based AR platforms

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of heat generation in power devices using 3D visualization with AR technology.
Learners can quantitatively analyze the effectiveness of thermal management systems (e.g., heatsinks, fans) through virtual experiments.
Learners can identify overheating risk scenarios and propose response strategies via real-time interactive simulations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
